name: Chimerandom
description:
Play as a Chimera and absorb your prey to upgrade your body part randomly.

Okay this is a mess so expect tons of bugs this is for UDC Jam #22, and also my first jam experience it was fun but I need more time lol (there is no main menu and UI yet sorry).

How to play:

  • Left/Right Arrow Keys = Walking
  • A = Head / Tail Attack (Depends on player direction)
  • W = Up Attack
  • S = Front Leg / Arm Attack
  • D = Tail / Head Attack
  • Space Bar = Jump
  • Left Shift = Sprint (Only for Lion's Back Legs)
  • Fly = Press Space Bar while jumping to toggle flying

Credits:

  • BGM: Again by LunaLucid Music
  • Tileset: 2D Forest Tileset Pack Toon Style by DinV Studio
